Article.ArticleTitle: Semantic variant primary progressive aphasia with a pathogenic variant p.Asp40Gly in the ANXA11 gene.

Abstract.AbstractText: We report a patient with right-predominant semantic variant primary progressive aphsia linked with p.Asp40Gly variant of ANXA11, which is the first description of frontotemporal dementia without clinical and electrophysiological evidences of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis associated with a known pathogenic variant of ANXA11.
